mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T1.OG_ID , T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.OG_CD , T1.OG_NM , T1.OG_NM || ' (' || T1.OG_CD || ')' AS OG_CD_NM , T1.HGR_OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BASE_YM >= SUBSTR(#{strtSvDt},0,6) AND T1.BASE_YM <= SUBSTR(#{endSvDt},0,6) AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') AND T1.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY T1.OG_CD
